placeholderImages.description: A vibrant and abstract representation of musical score.
A professional and friendly portrait of a composer in a creative studio.
Sheet music spread across a wooden desk with a fountain pen.
A close-up of fingers playing a chord on a steel-string acoustic guitar.
A vintage microphone in a recording studio, with sound baffles in the background.
A sound mixing console with many faders and knobs, lit in a dark room.
A choir singing in a grand hall with beautiful acoustics.
